name: Rachel Dawes
description: Rachel Dawes is a crucial supporting character and moral compass in The Dark Knight Trilogy.

content.title: Background
content.body: Rachel Dawes grew up in Gotham City where she became close friends with Bruce Wayne. After witnessing Gotham's corruption first-hand, she pursued a career in law, eventually becoming an Assistant District Attorney.

content.title: Personality
content.body: Rachel is known for her determination and commitment to justice. She is fearless in the face of danger, honest to a fault, and serves as a moral grounding for Bruce Wayne.

content.title: Story Role
content.body: Rachel's character serves as Bruce Wayne's childhood friend and love interest. She plays a pivotal role in his journey to becoming Batman by questioning his motives and providing him with ethical insights.

content.title: Relationships
content.body:
- **Bruce Wayne**: Childhood friend and love interest. Rachel serves as a critical influence and voice of reason for Bruce.
- **Harvey Dent**: Romantic interest in 'The Dark Knight', complicating her relationship with Bruce Wayne.
- **Carmine Falcone and Jonathan Crane**: Adversaries in her fight against corruption in Gotham City.

properties.portrayed_by: Katie Holmes (Batman Begins), Maggie Gyllenhaal (The Dark Knight)
